summary: Adds Katia Managan as a potential follower from Prequel Adventure.
descriptionHtml:
Katia Managan some how managed to make it to WhiteRun in Skyrim, and that\'s a long way from Kvatch in Oblivion.

There are no quests or unique dialogue yet. This mod just adds Katia Managan along with a few other followers in white run.  She is also marriageable.

Inside the zip file, there are two esp files. Extract them to your Skyrim Data folder (the folder where the master.sem file is located)  then enable it in your mod manager.

AAAcompanionandfix.esp adds Katia Managan to WhiteRun. It also makes the female darkelf at Azura\'s shrine marriable too.
You will notice that Katia does not have a Khajiit voice. The Khajiit voices do not support followers in Skyrim, and according to Prequel, Katia also does not have Khajiit voice.

The other esp file adds some other but over powered followers to white run.

Katia has so much health that she is nearly invincible, but her fire damage is only moderately powerful.

I highly recommend that you add...
The companion system overhall http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14037
CBBE Outfits http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12273
CBBE body mod http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2666
Katia\'s arena outfit http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32093

Coming soon will be a new esp file, and in the new one, katia will come equipped the the arena outfit, and have a facial improvement.  This will be in version 2.

Don\'t forget to comment and Endorse.
author: Blezmo
